channel.title: CVE Feed for PluginOps -- Landing Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PluginOps -- Landing Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-34752|2024-05-17T06:01:38.329Z -- PluginOps -- Landing Page Builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30452|2024-03-29T16:40:07.647Z -- PluginOps -- Landing Page Builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.7.
